## BatchOperationsService.batchCopy() method

Copies a batch of items. This operation returns an instance of 'BatchOperationCreationResult' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static batchCopy({ requestModel, }: {
        requestModel: BatchCopyRequest;
    }): CancelablePromise<BatchOperationCreationResult>;
```
